authors.name: Matthew Alhonte
authors.bio: Super villain in somebody's action hero movie. Experienced a radioactive freak accident at a young age, which rendered him part-snake and strangely adept at Python.

https://www.quora.com/How-are-cracked-versions-of-software-created-and-why-are-developers-not-able-to-prevent-it



https://www.quora.com/What-is-the-most-sophisticated-piece-of-software-code-ever-written



https://www.quora.com/What-are-the-main-differences-between-a-principal-component-analysis-and-a-factor-analysis



https://peerj.com/articles/5518/



https://realpython.com/python-pandas-tricks/



https://github.com/trekhleb/learn-python/blob/master/README.md



Our beautiful fellow workers are out here with comrades from @techworkersco
[https://twitter.com/techworkersco?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw], @MobToMeltICE
[https://twitter.com/MobToMeltICE?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw], and others in front of 
@tableau [https://twitter.com/tableau?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw]  to ask them to stop
working with ICE! pic.twitter.com/jZwQYdsdkh [https://t.co/jZwQYdsdkh]
